synopsis.text: Yu and Nobu, two schoolgirls, find themselves trapped on their school rooftop, perfecting their manzai comedy routine, while a sinister threat looms below. Their once tranquil school has transformed into a breeding ground for the supernatural, with former classmates turning into ravenous zombies. Legend has it, a single bite from one of these creatures can lead to a gruesome transformation, causing the victim to join the ranks of the undead. As panic engulfs the school, Yu, Nobu, and their fellow survivors must rely on their wits and camaraderie to outsmart the zombie horde and make a daring escape. This chilling tale of survival unfolds in a special New Year's broadcast, leaving viewers on the edge of their seats as the stage is set for a deadly showdown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
